mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (id, pwd, name, email, birth, sns, reg_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{sns}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT id, pwd, name, email, birth, sns, reg_date FROM user_info WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, pwd, name, email, birth, sns, reg_date FROM user_info WHERE id = #{id} AND pwd = #{pwd}
